experiences.title: Software Engineer
experiences.summary: Lead engineer on micro-frontend architecture and BFF services for Lowe's Returns Android and web applications.
bullets: Led adoption of a micro-frontend architecture for the Loweâ€™s Returns Android app to improve scalability and developer velocity.
Implemented new UX flows in React, Ionic, and Capacitor for the Returns Android application used by sales-floor associates.

Built and maintained a Node.js + Fastify Backend-for-Frontend (BFF) service powering the Returns Android and web apps, including optimized REST APIs, request validation, and cross-service orchestration.

experiences.title: Full-stack Web Developer
experiences.summary: Delivered end-to-end full-stack web applications for startups and SMBs, from scoping through deployment and CI/CD.
bullets: Delivered end-to-end web applications for startups and SMBs sourced through Upwork, including scoping, architecture, and full-stack development.
Developed applications using Next.js, Node.js, and Go.
Deployed workloads to AWS using custom CDK stacks and implemented CI/CD pipelines using GitHub Actions.

experiences.title: Front End Engineer
experiences.summary: Implemented and launched new React experiences for the AWS IAM Console and supported production operations.
bullets: Led implementation and launch of new React user experiences on the AWS Identity and Access Management (IAM) Console, impacting thousands of customers.
Participated in a monthly on-call rotation resolving customer issues, triaging CloudWatch alarms, and debugging service degradations in collaboration with backend teams.
Presented weekly operational status updates to the broader Identity organization.
Voluntarily left AWS to relocate closer to family in Chicago and was not affected by layoffs.

experiences.title: Software Engineer Intern
experiences.summary: Contributed to a Dart and React-based web application using Agile practices and automated testing.
bullets: Contributed to development of a Dart- and React-based web application (Wdesk).
Worked within Agile development methodologies, participating in code reviews and writing unit and integration tests.

experiences.title: Web Software Developer Intern
experiences.summary: Developed a full-stack discrepancy logger web application and containerized it for CI/CD.
bullets: Developed an Audio Engineering discrepancy logger web application using MongoDB, Express.js, Angular, and Node.js as the sole developer.
Containerized the application with Docker to support CI/CD.

education.summary: Bachelor of Science in Software Engineering with a 3.01 GPA.

awards.title: Technical Education Senior Award
awards.summary: Awarded for outstanding work and dedication in the area of Technical Education.

awards.title: WSC Logo Design
awards.summary: Won 1st place prize of $1,000 in a logo design competition hosted by the Wheaton Sport Center in Wheaton, IL.
